about_the_game:
Ever wanted to be the sexual stress relief for a bunch of unstable monster-girl mercenaries? Enjoy over eighteen interactive, uncensored, multi-artwork sex scenes!

From everyone's favorite sweet company fox-mom Aio, to the bratty Shizu who puts the 'aggravated' in 'aggravated assault with a deadly weapon'; you've got two unique flavors of Kitsune sisters to enjoy!

Or if eccentric intelligence is more your style, feel free to interact with Kyva the boozy but brilliant in-house chemist! She's a lizard-serpent-reptile-lady-thing with a thicc tail and zero social intelligence, what's not to love?!

Finally, few are as cold as Adelaide the ice-wielding close-quarters-combatant elf! She's not easily impressed, rarely amused, and a strict teacher. However, just below the surface, she has a submissive streak if you know how to find it...

Hilarious fully voiced dialogue, and lustful moan-filled sex scenes!

Voiced by a Legendary roster of NSFW Voice actors such as OpaluVA, MidnightDatura, Chloe Angel, and @Shennychwan!

Featuring an extensive range of dialogues full of dark comedy, saucy sluttiness, and fascinating insights into the fractured world PMC Promiscuity takes place in! including additional guest voices from Gianni Matragrano, CinderDryad, Daltos, and more! 

Do you have what it takes to satisfy these insatiable horny mercenaries?

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains graphic uncensored sex scenes with detailed descriptions and accompanying voice acting & SFX.

Discusses themes of violence, excessive alcohol use, and the use of fictional pharmaceutical drugs.

Some sex scenes and referenced sexual acts feature power dynamics, including power dynamics within a business setting such as a boss and employee, however all depictions and references to these power dynamics are consensual from all parties involved.

name: PMC Promiscuity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Take on the role of a recruit (and stress-relief) joining the famous monster girl private military company: Manticore International!
